CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In an attempt to further improve the performance of the PCDTBT - based polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) , we have synthesized a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , PCDSeBT , in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) monomer alternately flanks with a 2,7-carbazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT: Poly(3,4-di(thiophene-2-yl)-2,5-bis(3-terthiophenylsulfonyl)benzo-thiophene): A type of polymer.
2. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells: A specific type of solar cells.
3. PCDSeBT: Poly(3,4-di(thiophene-2-yl)-2,5-bis(diselenienylbenzothiadiazole)benzo-thiophene): A synthesized selenophene analogue of PCDTBT.
4. DSeBT: Diselenienylbenzothiadiazole: A monomer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In an attempt to further improve the performance of the PCDTBT - based polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) , we have synthesized a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , PCDSeBT , in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) monomer alternately flanks with a 2,7-carbazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT - Poly(3,4-di(thiophene-2-yl)-2,5-bis(3-terthiophenylsulfonyl)benzo-thiophene)
2. PSCs - Polymer Solar Cells
3. PCDSeBT - Poly(3,4-di(thiophene-2-yl)-2,5-bis(diselenienylbenzothiadiazole)benzo-thiophene)
4. DSeBT - Diselenienylbenzothiadiazole.

1. PCDSeBT - The synthesized selenophene analogue of PCDTBT, a material used in PSCs.

There are no other entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In an attempt to further improve the performance of the PCDTBT - based polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) , we have synthesized a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , PCDSeBT , in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) monomer alternately flanks with a 2,7-carbazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT - This is a specific type of polymer, PCDTBT-based polymer solar cells.
2. PSCs - These are polymer solar cells in general.
3. PCDSeBT - This is a new synthesized polymer, a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT.
4. DSeBT - This is a specific monomer, diselenienylbenzothiadiazole.
5. 2,7-carbazole unit - This is a specific functional group or unit.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PCDSeBT - This is a synthesized polymer with improved material property for PSCs.
2. PSCs - Polymer solar cells, the material system where the property improvement is being made.

So, the relevant entities are PCDSeBT and PSCs.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT (synthesized polymer) |
| PSCs (polymer solar cells) |
